title: Noah Harms
text:
Noah Lucho Harms (born 5 May 1997), is a professional <a href="soccer">football</a> player who represents the <a href="Aruba%20national%20football%20team">Aruban national team</a>.
He made his international debut for Aruba against <a href="St.%20Lucia%20national%20football%20team">St. Lucia</a> on 22 March 2019 in a 3-2 defeat against in the <a href="CONCACAF%20Nations%20League">CONCACAF Nations League</a> qualifying rounds, securing their spot to League B. 
On 18 November 2019, Harms scored his first goal for Aruba and his first own goal against <a href="Antigua%20and%20Barbuda%20national%20football%20team">Antigua and Barbuda</a> in a 2-3 defeat in the <a href="CONCACAF%20Nations%20League">CONCACAF Nations League</a>.
